Improving survival prediction models for liver transplantation candidates Preface

Improving survival prediction models for liver transplantation candidates Ben Felix Jacob Goudsmit Preface This thesis was constructed under the supervision of prof. dr. Bart van Hoek, prof. Hein Putter, and dr. Andries E. Braat. The research was conducted at the Leiden University Medical Center and the Eurotransplant International Foundation.
